choices: A surprise mission and a new mutant
115331.content:
Now for the matter of how, what happens to these formidable mutants to leave them all padded?

What if Cerebro detected a young mutant whose powers have just awoken. And this new mutant in question can’t seem to control their strange and powerful new abilities and need immediate help and maybe even extraction before they cause an incident. So a carefully composed team (of the author’s choosing) are sent out to give aid to this young mutant before anyone can get hurt
115331.title: Diapered as a team

1153312.content:
What if the ladies of Xaviers school for gifted youngsters were throwing a baby shower and just decided to celebrate in a very odd way.

With the guests attending in diapers and other babyish clothes as well as plenty of games fun is sure to be abound

132113321211.title: Readers Choice #1

1321133212112.content: Who hits her by mistake with it?
1321133212112.title: One of the New Recruits accidently hits her

choices: She starts talking like a baby
13211332121121.content:
It was Multiple, the youngest recruit. He was hanging out in the lab when he slipped and accidently hit the ray's 'On' switch just as Kitty came in. The ray flied out and hit her in the gut, knocking her down with a cry of pain.

What next?
13211332121121.title: Readers Choice #1

132113321211211.content:
Kitty sat up, looking confused. Upon seeing Jamie, however, she smiled. But when she opened her mouth, something very surprising happened.

"Da ba googie babba! Por seedie boomp!" Kitty babbled like a baby, reaching out to Jamie.

"Oh boy." Jamie gulped nervously. He then decided to...
132113321211211.title: She starts talking like a baby

1321133212112111.content:
Jamie managed to pick Kitty up, despite their height differences, and carried her to Jean, who was reading in the living room.

"Jean! I need your help!" Jamie called, lugging Kitty over to the couch. "Why? What happened?" Jean asked as she walked over. Seeing Jean, Kitty began babbling gibberish again.

"Ba ba gosp oopda pooma woompa!" She cooed, kicking her legs in the air with a giggle.

"What happened to Kitty?" Jean asked. "I don't know! I accidently activated Beast's new invention and it hit her just as she came into the room. When she got up, she started talking like a baby!" Jamie explained nervously.

"Let me see what I can do." Jean said as she began reading Kitty's mind. After a few minutes, she stopped and sighed. "I managed to probe her mind. It seems Mr. McCoy's new device regressed her mind to infancy." Jean explained to Jamie.

"How long will it last?" Jamie asked as Kitty sucked her thumb while watching them. Upon seeing Jamie watching her, she smiled and mumbled happily.

"At least a few days. In the meantime, we'd better stock up on baby stuff for that time. It's a good thing there's no school until next week and we don't need to worry about the others since the other New Recruits went on that survival training with Wolverine and Scott, Rogue and Kurt went with Storm on that mission to Africa." Jean said thoughtfully.

What happens next?
1321133212112111.title: Take her to Jean

choices: Jean goes out and brings back baby supplies
Jean waits until Kitty wakes up before going shopping
13211332121121112.content:
At that moment, Kitty took her thumb out of her mouth and frowned. "Baba!" She chirped. "What?" Jamie asked her.

"BABA!" Kitty demanded. "I think she wants a bottle." Jean translated. Kitty nodded her head furiously. "Wanna baba now!" she cried. "Okay." Jean smiled gently as she went to the kitchen and quickly made a bottle full of milk.

"Here you go Kitty." she smiled, handing it to Kitty. Kitty took it and immediately started sucking on it as she laid on her back again. "This is so weird." Jamie remarked as he watching the infant minded 15-year-old drinking her bottle.

"At least she's quiet." Jean smiled. Kitty soon finished her bottle and threw it aside, laughing and clapping her hands as it bounced across the floor.

"I'd better burp her." Jean decided as she tossed a towel she'd grabbed from the kitchen over her shoulder and placed Kitty over her shoulder. Gently patting Kitty's back, Jean had soon burped Kitty, who giggled and then yawned sleepily.

"We'd better lay her down for a nap." Jean told Jamie as she telekinetically carried Kitty to her bed. Soon, Kitty was tucked in and sucking on some of her fingers as she slept.

What next?
13211332121121112.title: Kitty demands a bottle

1322121111.title: Rogue

choices: Rogue asks Jubilee what she's doing
13221211111.content:
One afternoon, Jubilee was in her bedroom. It was only her and Rogue at the mansion since the others were away on a mission. Upon making sure her door was closed, Jubilee pulled off her shorts and underpants and replaced the latter with a thick Pampers diaper. Ever since she was a little kid, she'd loved wearing and using diapers, even after undergoing potty training.

After tugging her shorts on, Jubilee smiled as she looked at the way her shorts bulged over her diaper. She then poked it. "Why would anybody wanna be toilet trained when they can wear diapees?" She wondered as she waddled slightly back to her bed.

At that moment, the door opened and Rogue walked in. "Hey, Jubilee. Ah was wonderin' if you'd..."

Rogue stopped as she saw Jubilee's diaper poking out of her shorts.

"Uh... hi, Rogue!" Jubilee chirped, blushing furiously.

What next?
13221211111.title: Walks in on Jubilee wearing Pampers

Jamie quickly managed to pick Kitty up, despite their height differences, and carried her to Jean, who was reading in the living room.

"Jean! I need your help!" Jamie called, lugging Kitty to the couch. "Why? What happened?" Jean asked as she walked over. Upon seeing Jean, Kitty began babbling gibberish.

"Ba ba gosp oopa pooma!" She cooed, kicking her feet in the air with a giggle.

"What happened to her?" Jean asked. "I don't know! I accidently activated Beast's new invention and it hit her just as she came into the room. When she sat up, she started babbling like a baby!" Jamie explained nervously.

"Let's see what I can do." Jean said as she started trying to read Kitty's mind. After a few minutes, she stopped and sighed. "I managed to probe into her mind. It seems Mr. McCoy's new invention's mentally regressed her to infancy." She explained to Jamie.

"How long will it last?" Jamie asked as Kitty started sucking her thumb while watching them. Upon seeing Jamie looking at her, she smiled and cooed happily.

"At least a few days. In the meantime, I think we'd better stock up on baby stuff for a few days. Luckily there's no school and we don't need to worry about the others since the other New Recruits are off on a survival trip with Wolverine and Scott, Rogue, Kurt and Spyke are on a mission with Storm in Africa." info.brief_description: Girls from the X-Men end up diapered! How and why is your choice!
info.description:
Guidelines

I want only girls to be diapered.

Pooping and Peeing is allowed

No sex

No swearing profusely

No slurs

Have fun!
